name: F1 World Grand Prix
description:
F1 World Grand Prix is a simulation-racing game developed by Lankhor. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Eidos Interactive. On review aggregator Metacritic, F1 World Grand Prix has a score of 71. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play F1 World Grand Prix on Nintendo 64 and PC.
Wes Hoffman directed the game. It was scored by Dan Hess.
